#BlackMagicCraft #Episode174 #Sponsored

In this video I take you through my experience ordering some custom miniatures from Hero Forge. I order three material versions of the same design and paint up the cheapest option. 

This video was sponsored by Hero Forge.

Try out the interface and order your own:
www.heroforge.com
